images.name: Luke Kennard [608x342]
images.caption: Luke Kennard is a sneaky streaming option Saturday with Ja Morant out.

images.name: Quick fantasy basketball roster fixes
images.caption: Spencer Dinwiddie is widely available in ESPN leagues and should see his production rise with Luka Doncic out of the Dallas lineup.

articles.description: Steve Alexander breaks down Saturday's games and offers his top fantasy streamers and favorite bets for the nine-game slate.
articles.headline: Fantasy basketball picks and betting tips for Saturday

images.name: Derrick Rose would love his Bulls jersey retired
images.caption: Shams Charania sits down with NBA legend Derrick Rose to discuss his career and giving back to Chicago.

articles.description: The Bulls will retire Derrick Rose's No. 1 jersey to the rafters next season, the team announced.
articles.headline: Bulls to retire Derrick Rose's No. 1 jersey next season

images.name: David Dennis Jr.: Pat Riley has mishandled the Jimmy Butler situation
images.caption: David Dennis Jr. explains how Pat Riley and the Heat mishandled the Jimmy Butler situation by not giving him a contract or trading him earlier.

articles.description: David Dennis Jr. explains how Pat Riley and the Heat mishandled the Jimmy Butler situation by not giving him a contract or trading him earlier.
articles.headline: David Dennis Jr.: Pat Riley has mishandled the Jimmy Butler situation

images.name: LeBron: It's 'humbling' to break Michael Jordan's 30-point record
images.caption: LeBron James reflects on what it means to break Michael Jordan's record for 30-point games.

articles.description: LeBron James reflects on what it means to break Michael Jordan's record for 30-point games.
articles.headline: LeBron: It's 'humbling' to break Michael Jordan's 30-point record

images.name: What's the Clippers' ceiling with Kawhi returning?
images.caption: Norris Cole explains why he says the Clippers' ceiling with Kawhi Leonard returning to the team is the Western Conference semifinals.

articles.description: Norris Cole explains why he says the Clippers' ceiling with Kawhi Leonard returning to the team is the Western Conference semifinals.
articles.headline: What's the Clippers' ceiling with Kawhi returning?

images.name: Messi surprised with MVP award by Inter Miami's academy players
images.caption: MLS commissioner Don Garber presents Lionel Messi with the MVP award in front of a group of Inter Miami academy players.

articles.description: Earvin "Magic" Johnson and Lionel Messi will receive the Presidential Medal of Freedom during a ceremony at the White House.
articles.headline: Magic Johnson, Lionel Messi to get Presidential Medal of Freedom
